segments.text: This kitchen's turning into a swimming pool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overflowing sink, water all over the place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mom's clueless, just drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids are raiding the cookie jar behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's on a stool that's about to give way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tilting; he could crash down hard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's hand is out, begging for treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're breaking the rules, but it's tempting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle's spreading; slippery disaster incoming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the mess they'll have to clean.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Garden outside mocks the indoor chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't anyone shutting off the water?
segments.speaker: PAR
